title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 504.2 - Reapplication
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 504.2 - Reapplication

State Regulations

Upon denial of an application, no new application for the
same or similar relief by the same person or an affiliate of that person will
be entertained for a period of six months from the date of the denial. Principals of corporate applicants may not reapply in their own names or as
principals of other corporations for the same period of time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
